LandingPage.HeroDescription: Organize, analyze and share knowledge effectively with the power of AI.
LandingPage.FeatureTitle: Powerful features to help you manage all your knowledge.
LandingPage.FeatureDescription: Integrated right into your workspace, Viet is ready to brainstorm, summarize, support writing and search for everything you need.
LandingPage.FeatureCard1Description: Share your work with just 1 link
LandingPage.FeatureCard3Description: Leverage collective intelligence with the help of AI
LandingPage.FeatureCard4Description: Learn from others and contribute your expertise
LandingPage.FeaturePreviewCard1Title: Flexible note editor: Flexibility at your fingertips
LandingPage.FeaturePreviewCard1Description: From simple lists to detailed documents, our easy-to-use editor helps you manage notes quickly and efficiently. Explore creativity and organization with ease.
LandingPage.FeaturePreviewCard2Description: Each section of the editor displays relevant options when you right-click on items like chat, menu, sidebar, and homepage
LandingPage.FeaturePreviewCard3Title: Upload, share, and preview any file
LandingPage.FeaturePreviewCard3Description: Easily upload files, explore content with AI-powered insights, and engage in conversations with data-driven chatbots. Share documents securely and optimize team work efficiently
LandingPage.FeedbackDescription: Explore the impact we've made through customer stories. Real-life success stories, collaborations and innovations that demonstrate the value we bring to their projects
LandingPage.FeedbackCardCard1Title: Viet has truly transformed the way we approach knowledge management. The ability to seamlessly integrate multiple documents and instantly retrieve key information has dramatically improved our workflow. It's like having a personal research assistant available 24/7!
LandingPage.FeedbackCardCard2Title: Viet's AI-powered chat tool has made it easier than ever for our team to collaborate and share knowledge. With the ability to quickly search and extract information from documents, our productivity has skyrocketed!
LandingPage.FeedbackCardCard3Title: As a researcher, I am particularly impressed with Viet's user interface. The ability to visually tag and organize information makes managing and researching knowledge easier than ever. This is truly a breakthrough!
